item.title: ICXCAC Success at the Brighton 10k
item.author: Minty Hampden-Martin,Aymeric Regnier,
item.description: On Sunday 17th November, a rowdy group of 56 of Imperial’s finest specimens woke up in the wee hours to catch their 6:36 train from London Bridge. While most would cringe at the idea of such an early wakke-up on their rest day, the ICXCAC runners all rose to the challenge and (nearly all) made it on …
